headline: Dollar General (DG): Evaluating Valuation as Shares Rally and Discount Narrows
summary: Dollar General (DG) is drawing attention today, with investors eyeing how shares have been trending over the past month. Many are considering recent shifts as they look at the retailer’s underlying performance and relative discount compared to this year’s highs. See our latest analysis for Dollar General. Dollar General's share price return has surged 8.9% over the past month, and momentum is clearly building as the year-to-date share price return now tops 43%. While the short-term gains are...
